scripts.dev:local: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const src=fs.existsSync('env.local.supabase')?'env.local.supabase':(fs.existsSync('.env.local.supabase')?'.env.local.supabase':null);if(!src){console.error('Missing env file: create env.local.supabase (or .env.local.supabase)');process.exit(1)}fs.copyFileSync(src,'.env.local');fs.copyFileSync(src,'.env')" && prisma db push && next dev
